Description:
Detects registry modifications that disable internal tools or functions in explorer (malware like Agent Tesla uses this technique)

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Registry Explorer Policy Modification
Query:
sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (target_object like '%software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\policies\explorer
ologoff' or target_object like '%software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\policies\explorer
odesktop' or target_object like '%software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\policies\explorer
orun' or target_object like '%software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\policies\explorer
ofind' or target_object like '%software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\policies\explorer
ocontrolpanel' or target_object like '%software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\policies\explorer
ofilemenu' or target_object like '%software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\policies\explorer
oclose' or target_object like '%software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\policies\explorer
osettaskbar' or target_object like '%software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\policies\explorer
opropertiesmydocuments' or target_object like '%software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\policies\explorer
otraycontextmenu') and details = 'dword (0x00000001)'
